name: Garlic Shrimp Scampi with Mushrooms
author: JamaicaCrazy
summary: This dish is easy to make and quick. The more garlic the better! I make this recipe at least once a week. Serve with garlic bread and a salad for a complete meal.
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook angel hair pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 4 to 5 minutes
Melt butter in a skillet over medium-high heat
Saute mushrooms, onion, scallions, and garlic until onions are translucent, about 5 minutes
Add wine, broth, tomatoes, and parsley
Stir and reduce heat to low
Place shrimp and flour in a resealable plastic bag; shake and mix until shrimp is well coated
Cook until shrimp are opaque, about 5 minutes
Pour sauce and shrimp over the pasta; squeeze lemon juice on top
